item.title: Comment on Friday assorted links by RAD
item.description:
[BONUS] 8. The initial reviews of the Rabbit R1, a new AI-powered gadget, present a mixed but generally optimistic view of its potential and current capabilities.

If the AnimalLovingVoteBot is still active, this comment will rise above the Campus LARPing comments, otherwise, it will remain hidden deep in the rabbit hole.

[BONUS] 9. Apple OpenELM released along with a newly published paper.

It comes in four sizes (270M, 450M, 1.1B, and 3B) targetting on-device inference like Microsoft's recently announced Phi-3-mini with 3.8 billion parameters. It was benchmarked on Intel/Nvidia hardware with CUDA software as well as Apple Silicon (M2 Max) with an MLX port. According to the paper, inference speed is not yet best-in-class:

In future work, we plan to explore optimization strategies to further improve the inference efficiency of OpenELM.

It's happening, just not as anticipated. Software eats the world with careful bites. Go big or go small. May you live in interesting times.

item.title: Comment on Friday assorted links by Freebird
item.description:
First they came for my freedom of speech...I did not speak up.
Then they came for my freedom assembly...I did not show up
Then they came for my right to bear arms...so I shot them.

item.title: Comment on Friday assorted links by Pubby
item.description:
Let me get this straight. Caroline Fohlin, a white woman, is complaining about her treatment by the police.

As a white man, I’m an order of magnitude higher to get my ass beaten or shot by cops. Were I black, it would be another order.

In the interest of equity, she needs to beat her own ass like a rented mule.

item.title: Comment on Friday assorted links by JWatts
item.description:
https://www.cnn.com/videos/us/2024/04/25/emory-university-pro-palestinian-protest-police-digvid.cnn

At 1:26-27 in this video it looks as if she takes a swing at the officer. She clearly brings her arm back and swings it around at him. He throws his arm up and ducks and then pushes her to the ground and handcuffs her.
